text: Fanny by Gaslight also known as Man of Evil is a 1944 British drama movie directed by Anthony Asquith and was based on the 1940 novel of the same name by Michael Sadleir. It stars Phyllis Calvert, James Mason, Wilfrid Lawson, Stewart Granger, Jean Kent, Margaretta Scott, Nora Swinburne, Stuart Lindsell. ==Other websites== * Category:1944 drama movies Category:1940s historical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Anthony Asquith Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Fanny by Gaslight (movie)
